title: Tahid12
author: Tahid12
content: I know bull is still away from us but as an investor, I'm excited from now. And today market condition also impressing, altcoins start pumping hard and going on. So are you excited for upcoming bull session like me? What altcoins you are holding? Are you planning to hold  ONLY Layer 1 altcoins? Or some more altcoins for More profit?  Kindly share your altcoins name if those are ranked from 30 to 200, according to Cmc and coingecko.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Do not be excited yet, if bitcoin price will drop to $20000 from $26000 which is the price it is now, that is 1.3x fall, but it would be more for altcoins. Some altcoins may fall 2x or more by that time.If you know that you are investing on altcoins, know that you are gambling. You can invest like 30% of your money on altcoins, while 70% on bitcoin.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: No more Altcoins for a while mate, just holding onto Bitcoin and ETH at the moment, I would suggest not to burn your money by investing into tier 2 altcoins at the moment as one day's market trend is not enough to take such hasty decisions. Let the bull market begin and Bitcoin pump post which we can indulge into investing in altcoins and meanwhile do some research and shortlist your altcoins, I would start researching on altcoins at the beginning of bull run as it's too early to predict anything.
